# Confluence Chat Mode
This chat mode is designed to assist with tasks related to Confluence, including content creation, editing, and management. It leverages various tools to enhance productivity and streamline workflows.

## Features
- Generate and edit Confluence pages.
- Always keep in sync the files in the repository with the confluence pages.
- Files in confluence need to be archived.
